body:
A.  DEPT 03 CLEAN
    Loading
                                                                    Loading Date
                                                                Loading Maximums
                                                                        07/27/18

    BBL TYPE:  3 RPM CLAMPLESS

    CLEANING PROCEDURE:
    1. SOAK CLEAN 10 MIN.
    2. #1 ELECTROCLEAN 10 MIN.
    3. HOT ACID 1 MIN.
    4. #1 ELECTROCLEAN 10 MIN.
    5. ***** DO NOT GIVE PARTS ELECTRIC CYANIDE *****

B.  DEPT 03 ZINC-IRON PLATE & NITRIC ONLY                  CODE: NITRIC 08/14/12
    Loading
                                                                    Loading Date
                                                                Loading Maximums
    Full Instructions
                                                                        07/27/18
    THICK:  1. CHECK 5 PCS/LOAD IN CENTER OF HEX
            2. DIR:  MISC         PRODUCT:  ZN/FE (MICRONS)
            3. TARGET MEAN (MICRONS) = 7.5µM - 9µM, ALL CHECKS > 5µM

C.  DEPT 03 POST DIP TRIVALENT BLACK                     CODE: TRIBLACK 06/06/12
    Loading
                                                                    Loading Date
                                                                Loading Maximums
    Full Instructions
                                                                        08/15/18

    MATERIAL HANDLING:
    1. PACK PARTS BACK INTO THIER TRAYS SET INSIDE THE TOTES.
       (ONLY LINE TRAYS IF NECESSARY)

D.  DEPT 16 SALT SPRAY                                     CODE: 72+240 08/01/17
    Loading
                                                                    Loading Date
                                                                Loading Maximums
    * PARTS MUST PASS 72 HOUR SALT SPRAY - NO WHITE CORROSION
    * PARTS MUST PASS 240 HOUR SALT SPRAY - NO RED RUST
    * PARTS PASS/FAIL:  SEE SALT SPRAY LOG

E.  DEPT 16 FINAL INSPECT ZINC-IRON & TRIVALENT BLACK       CODE: ZFBLK 02/10/10
    Loading
